newsitem.title: USA: Rockford Industries names McDonnell CFO.
newsitem.headline: Rockford Industries names McDonnell CFO.

text.p: Rockford Industries Inc named Kevin McDonnell as chief financial officer.

McDonnell will take over the chief financial officer position from Larry Davis, effective Thursday, who will remain with the company on a consulting basis throughout the third fiscal quarter in order to effect a smooth transition.

Most recently, McDonnell served as chief financial officer of Printrak International responsible for all financial and administrative functions as well as overseeing the initial public offering of Printrak's stock in July, 1996.
From 1992 to 1995, he also served as Chief Financial Officer of Mobile Technology Inc.
